title: U.S.C. Coach Steve Sarkisian Taking Leave of Absence
text:
Published By: NYTimes College Football - Today 
Sarkisian did not attend practice Sunday, and Athletic Director Pat Haden said “it was very clear to me that he is not healthy.”... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
